reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks amazing and is true to size.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: I have a wedding in a couple weeks so I ordered a couple dresses. This is by far the best one for its price. It’s true to size. I’m 5’4 and 140-150 (I don’t weigh myself often and that’s what it was a couple months ago). I ordered a medium because I usually wear an 8 (sometimes a 6 but an 8 is the average right now). I tightened the corset as tight as possible and I am able to jump around without having to hold it up. No bra (I’m a DD) and no spanx because it is very flattering. I will say it will show underwear lines so if you decide to wear spanx- get one with a thong. Overall, great dress and can’t wait to wear it to the wedding! Read more
items.author: Rachel Aumack

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Weird fit
items.body: Slit went above my waist, but when I walked or moved it was alllll the way open. Not sure if it’s supposed to, so I was definitely disappointed by the way this dress was cut. Had to return due to this Read more
items.author: Madi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress champagne color just off!
items.body: Pretty dress true to size. The only reason I returned was because the champagne color was more tan with a pinkish undertone. It looked totally off from the other bridesmaids dresses. I loved the thickness of the material and seeing how cold August got here in Buffalo and that the wedding is September 6th, I would have liked to have worn this dress because I wouldn't be freezing on Saturday. This dress is also more of a fall wedding material and not a summer one. Which I like. It also has some stretch to it and I like the rushing by the mom pooch if you need to hide a little pudge. This dress can definitely be worn to multiple events as the material is a great quality and can be worn as part of a wedding party or formal event like a gala or black tie affair. The color was just a miss for me. If I need a dress for a future event I would consider buying this again but in a different color. Read more
items.author: Rue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Formal Dress, Great Quality, Very Comfortable
items.body: Loved wearing this dress! I am 5'6", 140lbs, 38B, Size 4-6. I originally bought a medium but the corset was laced all the way with room to spare so I exchanged for a small. The top is held up with boning and anti slip trim on the inside. I loved the draping that covered my mom tunmy. Loved the height of the slit, sexy but not risky. I did have to hem the dress about 4 inches all the way around and there was still a little rounded train which looked great when walking. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth C

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Partially finished.
items.body: Partially sowed some of the boning was coming out because the dress wasn’t finished properly. Other the than that the dress looked amazing on, just wish it was fully finished. Read more
items.author: Esme Tejada

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and elegant
items.body: Used this dress for a friend's wedding and received many compliments, felt amazing, sexy and elegant.suze is true to size, beautiful shade or black. Really comfortable, thick material, stretchy and support on chest area. Read more
items.author: Luz O. Acevedo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit!!
items.body: Great fit and quality for the price Read more
items.author: Cheryl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a simple dress up night
items.body: Aside from the top not staying up while sitting down (you have to really tighten the back) this dress wore beautifully. The train is kinda long so be prepared to know how to walk with it. Read more
items.author: Melody Canedo - Realtor

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Off Shoulder Evening Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Off Shoulder Evening Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Black, Champagne. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
